titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SECOND SPECIALTY) - Description

div.p: OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SECOND SPECIALTY) is the same as attribute NHS OCCUPATION CODE.
OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SECOND SPECIALTY) isÂ the secondary specialty NHS OCCUPATION CODE of a CONSULTANT.
The medical and dental specialty NHS OCCUPATION CODES are currently used exclusively for National Workforce and Electronic Staff Record purposes.
Note: these codes are not the same as those used for MAIN SPECIALTY CODE.
A second clinical specialty NHS OCCUPATION CODE is added to a CONSULTANT or Specialist's record where the doctor's primary (main) specialty is 'General Medicine'.

Note that Specialty codes for a doctor with an NHS OCCUPATION CODE of 021 General Surgery, or in the NHS OCCUPATION CODE range of 920 to 980 Community and Public Health Medicine/Dentistry, are not valid as a second clinical specialty.
